A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was utter garbage and did not live up to any of the hype or promises made prior to its release. There are some who will blindly accept the continuity issues between the force awakens and last Jedi such as Hux and Kylo fleeing star killer base only to find hux chasing the rebels on a cruiser and kylo somehow healed from his massive wounds. Yet somehow Finn is still in a Bacta suit.  The Finn/Rose subplot is completely useless and distracts from the entire money.
